Vision 2033 - 33 Days Challenge

Day 5 of our Vision 2033 – 33 Day Challenge!

For today’s message, we’re proud to share our Center of Excellence’s Vision 2033 Challenge video <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1994&user=10620> , led by Yussef Sabbagh.
This vision highlights our four core pillars and reflects our commitment to building a culture of continuous improvement, where LEAN & KAIZEN principles and operational excellence drive us forward to serve our customers, brands, and colleagues with excellence.

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1994&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-3-min.png> 	

Take One Chalhoub Everywhere
